from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, current_timestamp, when
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("Raw_to_confirm_scd_type2") \
    .getOrCreate()

source_path = "wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/EXPORT_Sales_Person.parquet"
target_path = "abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Sales_Person.parquet"

incoming_data = spark.read.parquet(source_path)


try:
    target_data = spark.read.parquet(target_path)
except Exception as e:
    print("Target table does not exist, creating new table.")
    target_data = spark.createDataFrame([], incoming_data.schema.add("start_date", "timestamp").add("end_date", "timestamp").add("is_current", "boolean"))

incoming_data = incoming_data.withColumn("start_date", current_timestamp()) \
                             .withColumn("end_date", lit(None).cast("timestamp")) \
                             .withColumn("is_current", lit(True))


join_condition = (incoming_data["BusinessEntityID"] == target_data["BusinessEntityID"]) & target_data["is_current"]

comparison_df = incoming_data.join(target_data, join_condition, "left_outer") \
                              .select(
                                  incoming_data["*"],
                                  target_data["attribute1"].alias("old_attribute1"),
                                  target_data["attribute2"].alias("old_attribute2"),
                                  target_data["is_current"].alias("old_is_current")
                              )

merged_data = incoming_data.alias("src").join(
    target_data.alias("tgt"),
    col("src.BusinessEntityID") == col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
    "full_outer"
)

final_data = merged_data.withColumn(
    "action",
    when(col("tgt.BusinessEntityID").isNull(), lit("INSERT"))  # New record
    .when(
        (col("src.attribute1") != col("tgt.attribute1")) |
        (col("src.attribute2") != col("tgt.attribute2")),
        lit("UPDATE")  # Changed record
    ).otherwise(lit("NO_ACTION"))  # No change
)

expired_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "UPDATE") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.attribute1"),
        col("tgt.attribute2"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        current_timestamp().alias("end_date"),
        lit(False).alias("is_current")
    )

new_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("INSERT", "UPDATE")) \
    .select(
        col("src.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("src.attribute1"),
        col("src.attribute2"),
        current_timestamp().alias("start_date"),
        lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("end_date"),
        lit(True).alias("is_current")
    )

unchanged_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "NO_ACTION") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.attribute1"),
        col("tgt.attribute2"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        col("tgt.end_date"),
        col("tgt.is_current")
    )

final_dim_table = expired_records.union(new_records).union(unchanged_records)

final_dim_table.write.parquet(target_path, mode="overwrite")
